name: Dan the Fisherman
description:
Dan the Fisherman is fishing for his friends with his new fishing gear.

Click on a fish and stay within the catching circle to reel them in. Post a screenshot with your high score in the comments :) 

Careful! Not all fish are worth catching! But they are all funny.

Thanks to Jemah, Amaya, Charlotte, Martin and Chris for the voice acting. 

Happy birthday Dan!
